About Me

I am a 2nd year Computer Engineering student at the University of Waterloo with a deep interest in automation and artificial intelligence. During my free time, I enjoy tinkering with hardware and coding up tools to automate my own life. Some of my other hobbies include fishing, cycling, weight-lifting, basketball, and curling. I also play a lot of Monster Hunter and various rhythm games, like this one.
